word: Promise after promise is given, assuring us of the fullness of power that God has, and yet we are so weak in faith that we do not grasp the power. O how much we need a living, earnest faith in the truths of God's Word! This great need of God's people is constantly before me. . . . What can we do to arouse them to see that we are living in the very evening of this earth's history? . . . We need to seek for a faith that will lay hold of the arm of Jehovah.
